definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: I'd like a No. 5 meal please. Medium-sized.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一个五号中号的套餐。

sentences.english: A medium baked potato is the size of a personal-size bar of soap.
sentences.chinese: 一份中号的烤土豆，和你浴室的肥皂一样大小。

sentences.english: I'd like a medium popcorn, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一份中号的爆玉米花。

sentences.english: Put the rice in a clay pot or a medium-sized pot.
sentences.chinese: 把米放进陶罐里或者中号的罐子里。

sentences.english: I would like a medium-sized vase, preferably with traditional Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 我想买一个中号的，最好带有传统的中国绘画。

sentences.english: I want the jacket in medium size.
sentences.chinese: 我想要这件中号的夹克。

definition: tuba/large size (clothes, print etc)/(polite) (your) name/(coll.) number two/to defecate
bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
